QuestData.Title: Panther Stalking
QuestData.Description: The youngest panthers fell easily before you. Panthers that have come of age will naturally be stronger, and quicker, and more difficult to defeat.$b$bLarger panther tracks lead to the west.
QuestData.CompletionText: Bhag'thera can prove to be an elusive beast. How fairs the hunt?
QuestData.RewardText: You take a moment to silently congratulate yourself on your panther hunting so far.
